name: Bradley the Bunny
description: This was for a school project that lasted for two weeks. Our team designed this game so that it could be used by anyone who would need to practice the psychomotor skills of their hands with an accessible tool. Our first target audience is special students who need a diverting tool to practice a lot the psychomotor skills of their hand. An example is that it could be facilitating the learning of writing for the child in need as they get extra practice from the game.
